org.osate.ge.operations

Interface OperationBuilder<PrevResultUserType>

  • Type Parameters:
    PrevResultUserType - 

    public interface OperationBuilder<PrevResultUserType>
    Builder uses for creating operations. In most cases, this builder should not be used to create an operation. Rather, the static methods in Operation should be used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • executeOperation

        void executeOperation(java.util.function.Function<PrevResultUserType,Operation> opProvider)
        Execute a suboperation. This function is intended for use only in the rare cases that the number of steps is not known until runtime.
        Parameters:
        opProvider - a function that provides a suboperation to execute.
